entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a student who is attending Professor McGonagall's Transfiguration lesson. He is mentioned to be sitting at the back of the room and feeling like he is under a spotlight.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is not described in detail, but he is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who descended Professor Trelawney's ladder and the winding stair with him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as a student who descended Professor Trelawney's ladder and the winding stair with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is mentioned as the teacher of Divination, from which Harry, Ron, and Hermione descended her ladder and the winding stair.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as the teacher of Transfiguration. She is mentioned to be teaching about Animagi and transforming herself into a tabby cat.

entities.name: animagi
entities.description: Animagi are wizards who can transform at will into animals, as described by Professor McGonagall in her Transfiguration lesson.
